name: Afterburner Classic
description:
Afterburner is a 320x240 dodging cliffs game.

Lloyd Summers, one of our founders, originally created this as one of his first handheld games. It was created for the GP2X-Wiz (a Linux handheld console). Handheld download here.

After coming across the old build files, we decided to create a release for the old handheld console - modernize, and share it on itch.io
